#summary Sample YADFC XML File for a Double Fanucci Deck.
#labels Phase-Support,Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The following is an example of an XML file for use with the command-line interface of Yet Another Double Fanucci Calculator(tm).

{{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!--
     For the order attribute, the values are:

     0 = Fanucci Gambit
     1 = Mind
     2 = Body
     3 = Spirit
     4 = Sidekick
-->
<cards order="0,1,2,3,4" slots="5">
    <card suit="Bugs" value="0" />
    <card suit="Bugs" value="1" />
    <card suit="Bugs" value="2" />
    <card suit="Bugs" value="3" />
    <card suit="Bugs" value="4" />

    <card suit="Mazes" value="0" />
    <card suit="Mazes" value="1" />
    <card suit="Mazes" value="2" />
    <card suit="Mazes" value="3" />

    <card suit="Fromps" value="0" />
    <card suit="Fromps" value="1" />

    <card suit="Inkblots" value="0" />

    <card suit="Ears" value="0" />
    <card suit="Ears" value="1" />
    <card suit="Ears" value="2" />

    <card suit="Time" value="0" />
    <card suit="Time" value="1" />
    <card suit="Time" value="2" />
    <card suit="Time" value="3" />
    <card suit="Time" value="4" />
    <card suit="Time" value="5" />
    <card suit="Time" value="6" />
    <card suit="Time" value="7" />
    <card suit="Time" value="8" />
    <card suit="Time" value="9" />
    <card suit="Time" value="10" />

    <card suit="Zurfs" value="0" />
    
    <card suit="Books" value="0" />
    <card suit="Books" value="1" />
    
    <card suit="Plungers" value="0" />
    <card suit="Plungers" value="1" />

    <card suit="Tops" value="0" />
    <card suit="Tops" value="1" />
    <card suit="Tops" value="2" />
    <card suit="Tops" value="3" />

    <card suit="Rain" value="0" />
    <card suit="Rain" value="1" />
    
    <card suit="Faces" value="0" />

    <card suit="Fanucci-Face" value="Beauty" />
    <card suit="Fanucci-Face" value="Jester" />
</cards>
}}}
